author: hwright
msg: Clarify the expected log message output format for merge auditing.  These
ideas come largely from these threads:
http://svn.haxx.se/dev/archive-2007-02/0518.shtml
http://svn.haxx.se/dev/archive-2007-04/0680.shtml
* www/merge-tracking/func-spec.html
(auditing-scope): Clarify the 'svn log' output format, and add a sample
message in that format.

author: hwright
msg: Answer question about the effect of reverts when using the '--merge-sensitive'
switch.  The text is largely lifted from dlr's explanation here:
http://svn.haxx.se/dev/archive-2007-04/0667.shtml
* www/merge-tracking/func-spec.html
(auditing-scope): Add information about reverts and '--merge-sensitive'.

author: cmpilato
msg: Just a little performance optimization of partial revision access
determination.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/fs-wrap.c
(get_readability): Possibly improve the performance of this function
in partial-read-access cases by returning this determination
as soon as we've figured it out (instead of continuing to process
all the remaining changed paths).

author: aogier
msg: * trunk/contrib/client-side/svn-merge-vendor.py:
Adding log support which replace all the old print >>sys.stderr
Correcting a bug which occured when the vendor made a new file which was then moved in an other path. Now the script detects the real origin of a moved file and check if the file is currently adding.

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/tests/libsvn_repos/repos-test.c
Code formatting changes only -- no logic changes.
